CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low band - gap conjugated polymers |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is "low band - gap conjugated polymers".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low band - gap conjugated polymers |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is "low band - gap conjugated polymers". The other entities, such as "high power conversion efficiency (PCE)" and "solar spectrum" are not "Material Name" entities, as they refer to properties and sources of light, respectively.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| low band-gap |
| broad absorption |
| high power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

Note: I have assumed that "low band-gap" and "broad absorption" are properties of the conjugated polymmers, and "high power conversion efficiency (PCE)" is a desirable property of the active layer materials.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

Note: After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have determined that "low band-gap" and "broad absorption" are not explicitly stated as properties of a specific material, but rather as desirable properties of low band-gap conjugated polymers. Therefore, I have only included "high power conversion efficiency (PCE)" as a valid property value entity.
